title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point(s) maximum

1 point is earned for a correct prediction with a valid justification.

Less than that of Po.

The two atoms have comparable effective nuclear charges, but the valence electrons in Lv would be at a greater distance from the nucleus than those in Po. By Coulomb’s law, the attractive force between the valence electrons and the nucleus decreases by the inverse square of the distance between them.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point(s) maximum

1 point is earned for the correct average atomic mass.

Average atomic mass = 2 10 ( 291.2 ) + 3 10 ( 292.2 ) + 5 10 ( 293.2 ) = 292.5   amu
